text: Myristica teijsmannii is a species of plant in the family Myristicaceae. It is a tree endemic to Java in Indonesia. It is threatened by habitat loss. ==References== * de Wilde, W.J.J.O. 1998. Myristica teijsmannii. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. title: Myristica teijsmannii
